urls.title: Consultation response on the Review of the Crisis Management and Deposit Insurance framework (CMDI) | Finance Watch
urls.description: Finance Watch calls upon EU policymakers and regulators to concentrate their efforts on the rigorous and consistent implementation of the existing bank recovery and resolution rulebook. The proposed review should aim, in particular, at closing regulatory gaps, strengthening the Single Resolution Mechanism (SRM), and promoting convergence of national insolvency frameworks.

tweets.text: [Live] Christian Stiefmüller represents @forfinancewatch on Panel 3: "The impact of the Covid-19 crisis on the banking sector" at 11:15, at the @EU_SRB annual conference. For our take on the EU crisis management framework, see👉https://t.co/4Dj1koONi2  #SRBResolution2021 https://t.co/RDMz6SJZc9

Vice-President #ClaudiaBuch on key elements of achieving a home-host balance as element of a resolution regime at the @EU_SRB Annual Conference 2021 https://t.co/67QyYTyLvS #SRBresolution2021 https://t.co/v2lziCDHR1

The stability and capacity of our banking system has a crucial role to play in economic recovery.
 
At the #SRBresolution2021 conference, I discussed what we have achieved and what remains to be done on #BankingUnion.

Read my remarks: https://t.co/UGhGCdUqHK https://t.co/BEYNIvFPXV

What a great opportunity to listen into the relevant, far reaching conversations from the @EU_SRB Single Resolution Board Annual Conference this week #graphicrecording #SRBresolution2021 https://t.co/FSpCecLQhl

We need to relaunch negotiations on EDIS. No action on EDIS is not an option. 

Thank you @EU_SRB for the discussion! #SRBresolution2021 https://t.co/CilsJL4ira

Competitive and resilient banking sector could provide a boost to the Capital Market Union, ensure necessary funding for the sustained growth in the years to come, build trust and strengthen Europe as a growing financial center. @EU_SRB https://t.co/jvMFUoNRgw

The reforms we put in place so far helped keep the financial system stable during the pandemic.

But we must be ready for the next crisis.

Our ambition for the Banking Union remains high, and there is no time to waste.

A complete Banking Union will benefit European citizens, businesses and banks.

Strong EU banks can provide competitive and innovative services for people and businesses across the EU.

Our #ConferenceManagers working behind the scenes to bring today's #SRBresolution2021 to life 👏

🔴 Follow live here 👇 

#BehindTheScenes @EU_SRB

Delighted to open the @EU_SRB Conference 2021 and speak about the importance of completing the Banking Union 🇪🇺🏦🇪🇺

#SRBresolution2021 https://t.co/IU26FIOXEV

#SRBresolution2021 - Bank resolution: delivering for financial stability
09:00 - 12:10 CET
https://t.co/chXyAwrRxW https://t.co/rpuLvPa8mA

urls.title: European Commission - EU Sustainable Investment Summit 2021
urls.description: The EU Sustainable Investment Summit 2021 is the first annual event of the European Commission on sustainable investment, following the launch of the European Green Deal, which sets the objective for Europe to become the first climate-neutral continent by 2050. As part of this new growth strategy, the EU adopted the European Green Deal Investment Plan. The EU’s plan for reco very and resilience after the Covid-19 crisis (NextGenerationEU) should also foster a strong increase of green investment across EU
